text: "Barack Obama would often say that if he could just meet every person in America, much like he was able to campaign and it would change the tone of politics, people would see that he is a good, honest person trying to do the right thing.
Maybe he wouldn't get any more votes than he otherwise would have gotten because there are legitimate differences of {MATT: That seems to be an important element!]
Most people would know the real Obama, not the Fox News caricature."
